DryadDataFile.dcterms:title: Total Tn-seq read counts for all annotated S. meliloti genes
DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Table shows the total number of Illumina reads obtained for each S. meliloti gene for all tested conditions. The raw results are shown as observed and then the normalized read counts per gene are also included.
DryadDataFile.dcterms:subject: antimicrobial peptides
symbiosis
host-microbe interactions
